page.title: 01Landscape Of Local Shops
page.content: Fighting Cocks shopping area serves a small part of south Wolverhampton. It is about two kilometres from the town centre aand there is a dense population in the area. There are thirteen shops. Some sell basic goods like the butcher, grocer and baker. There are two ladies shops, a hairdresser and a clothes shop. There are two take aways, a fish and chip shop and a Chinese. Also there are two pubs and a club. The shops are on a junction of two main roads. These roads are very busy and there are traffic lights at the junction. The traffic makes shopping difficult and it can be dangerous to cross the road. There are two bus stops and when people are getting on and off the buses it holds the trafffic up. It would be useful if there was a car park but there is no room.
